Past Session Information: Follow up session; Previous session focus: Psychoeducation about cognitive model, lack of confidence ,Anger management; Previous session action plan: Journaling, Behavioural Analysis/ ABC charting, Cognitive restructuring, Follow up after 1 week
Presenting Complaints (Symptoms): Lack of confidence:NA; Episodes of uncontrollable anger: NA; Low mood:NA; Cannabis use:NA
History: Patient has been facing low mood and lack of confidence. At times she gets irritable and snaps at her friends or family members which is out of proportion to the situation. She reports that she later regrets getting so angry. When she feels low, she resorts to taking marijuana which makes her feel better for a limited period of time and she forgets about her son ignoring her or not needing her anymore.
Issues discussed in Current Session: Analysis of anger episodes in the past week; Coping with low mood by cognitive restructuring
Clinical Diagnosis by Reviewer: Depression with Cluster B traits with Cannabis: Harmful Use
Action Plan: Client has been asked to continue journaling, challenge her dysfunctional thoughts and reframe them in a positive manner
